entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind light except northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys this morning and early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
